segments.text: Pardon me . I need an old music box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly how old a box do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I was thinking about something from the 1920s .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do any of the boxes have dancing figures ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dancing figures are quite popular . Two of the boxes have them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love the dancing figures . I'll take this music box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think you'll be very satisfied with that one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was wondering , does this come with any kind of warranty ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . But if something goes wrong with it , I know someone who repairs these things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's amazing that these things still work as well as they do .
segments.speaker: S2
